tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
  experiment_date DATE,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
  measured_value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    experimental_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE nanoscale_experiments (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    experimental_conditions JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE ExperimentalResults (
    ExperimentID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ExperimentDateTime TIMESTAMP,
    ExperimentDescription TEXT,
    ExperimentData BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE NanoscaleExperiments (
    NanoExperimentID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    NanoscaleImage BYTEA,
    NanoscaleVideo BYTEA,
    NanoscaleData JSON
)

CREATE TABLE ResearcherInformation (
    ResearcherID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ResearcherName TEXT,
    ResearcherEmail TEXT,
    ResearcherAffiliation TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MeasurementData (
  measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  measured_property VARCHAR(50),
  measurement_value FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES NanoscaleSamples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE experimental_results (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE,
    experiment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_id INT,
    data_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE nanoscale_experiments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE experimental_images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_name VARCHAR(255),
    experiment_id INT,
    image_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE research_articles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255),
    author_name VARCHAR(255),
    publish_date DATE
)
